name: Broadcast Companion (YouTube)
author: StreamWeasels

sections.description:
Broadcast Companion, used in combination with the theme Broadcast Lite or Broadcast PRO will integrate YouTube data into your theme. Every time your website is loaded, this plugin makes a request to YouTube to check if you are online. If you are online, data from YouTube is presented in the theme.

The following data is displayed from YouTube:

  • Online / Offline status from Twitch
  • Active game / category
  • Viewer count
  • Videos

Setup

This plugin keeps an active connection to the YouTube API, which requires you to add a YouTube API key. Instructions on where to find this data are included in the plugin, but you can also find those instructions here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Fixed broken notice check
  • Changed YouTube channel ID link
  • Minor messaging improvements

1.0.0

  • First release.

short_description: This plugin is for use with the Broadcast Lite theme and provides the youtube.com API functionality.
